name: Humming Bird 🌺 | 26th Jan, Sun | 4-6pm
description:
We're back with another bright and funky workshop! With step by step guidance
by an artist, and all materials provided we make painting easy for you.  
  
> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> 12 by 16 inch canvas  
> Beginner friendly  
> Children are welcome for all workshops  
> Includes a non alcoholic beverage & Brik Oven Pizza's to share
Location : Paint Bar, Sadashivnagar, Bangalore
